divs: Sighting Detailsi was a kid walking down the street it was in the subdivition holiday lake estates.i looked up to the west over gulf of mexico where the fla.powew plant is i think its teco now just a few miles away.i saw 6-9 huge huge brite beautiful different color orbs or circles spaced evenly apart they looked like plasma because they just glow no edges and they just hovered over the power plant even when the helecoptors came way undernieth them so a bunch of mcdill pilots saw them to. i tought they were not of this world and that the helecoptors were comming to protect the power plant.ilooked around to find someone to show to. as i remember i didnt see them leave or maybe i went to show my mom and they were gone i honestly dont remember the last part but ill always remember what i saw and they were huge about 5 times bigger than the big double bladed helecoptors thank you very much richard s sigler i did make a drawing of this
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tarpon Springs
There was one other sighting in Tarpon Springs on or around May 10th 1974
Summary: after dinner looked uo twards gulf of mexico over fla power 6-9 orbs glowing bright brilliant colors as high as a jet then a bunch of double bladed helecoptors came from the south undernieth the orbs then i dont remember anymore what happened
